selectTab(TabPane, String) - Static method in class org.aeonium.javafx.FXHelper

shutdown() - Static method in class org.aeonium.javafx.FXUnit
Optional method for shutting down the FXUnit framework - currently it is only used for adding a delay of 1s when finishing all test, in order to ensure that the last log actions may terminate.
shutdownStage(Stage) - Static method in class org.aeonium.javafx.FXHelper
Shut down a test stage, i.e., hide it an release it's content.
